packets.name: Account Login
packets.description: Initial login request sent to the login server. Contains account credentials for authentication.

packets.name: Game Login
packets.description: Login request sent to the game server after selecting a shard from the server list.

packets.name: Play Character
packets.description: Request to enter the world with a selected character from the character list.

packets.name: Play Server
packets.description: Request to connect to a specific game server from the server list.

fields.name: Server Index
fields.description: Index of selected server in the list

packets.name: Delete Character
packets.description: Request to delete a character from the account.

packets.name: Login Server Seed
packets.description: Initial connection packet sent before account login. Contains seed and client version information.

clientVersion.notes: Replaces the legacy 4-byte seed for clients 6.0.5.0+. Pre-6.0.5.0 clients send only a 4-byte seed without version info.

packets.name: Client Version
packets.description: Response to server's version request (0xBD). Contains the client version string.

packets.name: Client Type
packets.description: Sent by the client to identify the client type and version. Added during Kingdom Reborn/Stygian Abyss expansion.

related.note: Client Info - similar client type information sent at login

clientVersion.notes: Added during Kingdom Reborn/Stygian Abyss expansion

packets.name: Create Character (Old)
packets.description: Request to create a new character. This is the older 104-byte version with 3 starting skills. Replaced by 0xF8 in client 7.0.16.0+.

related.note: Create Character (New) for Classic 7.0.16.0+ with 4th skill

clientVersion.notes: Replaced by 0xF8 in Classic Client 7.0.16.0+. EC uses 0x8D instead.

packets.name: Create Character (New)
packets.description: Request to create a new character. This is the newer 106-byte version with support for 4 skills.

related.note: Create Character (Old) for Classic pre-7.0.16.0 with 3 skills

clientVersion.notes: Classic Client only. Replaces 0x00, adds 4th starting skill. EC uses 0x8D instead.

packets.notes: Uses the same handler as 0x00 but with 2 additional bytes for the 4th skill.

packets.name: Create Character
packets.description: Request to create a new character from Enhanced Client (KR/SA 3D clients). Variable length packet with different field layout than Classic client versions.

related.note: Create Character (Old) for Classic Client pre-7.0.16.0

clientVersion.notes: Enhanced Client only. Uses different field layout with separate gender/race bytes.

packets.notes: EC clients use this packet instead of 0x00/0xF8. The field layout differs significantly from Classic client versions, with separate gender and race bytes instead of combined genderRace field.
